chapter.text: Iya-sina
prajnamaya kora'anera kasama.
Niscaya apani prerita rasulaganera ekajana.
Sarala pathe pratisthita.
Kora'ana parakramasali parama dayalu allahara tarapha theke abatirna
yate apani emana eka jatike satarka karena, yadera purba purusaganake'o satarka kara hayani. Phale tara gaphela.
Tadera adhikansera jan'ye sastira bisaya abadharita hayeche. Sutaram tara bisbasa sthapana karabe na.
Ami tadera gardane cibuka paryanta beri pariyechi. Phale tadera mastaka urd'dhamukhi haye geche.
Ami tadera samane o pichane pracira sthapana karechi, atahpara taderake abrta kare diyechi, phale tara dekhe na.
Apani taderake satarka karuna ba na karuna, tadera pakse duye'i samana; tara bisbasa sthapana karabe na.
Apani kebala taderake'i satarka karate parena, yara upadesa anusarana kare ebam dayamaya allahake na dekhe bhaya kare. Ata'eba apani taderake susambada diye dina ksama o sam'manajanaka puraskarera.
Ami'i mrtaderake jibita kari ebam tadera karma o kirtisamuha lipibad'dha kari. Ami pratyeka bastu spasta kitabe sanraksita rekhechi.
Apani tadera kache se janapadera adhibasidera drstanta barnana karuna, yakhana sekhane rasula agamana karechilena.

Ami tadera nikata dujana rasula prerana karechilama, atahpara ora taderake mithya pratipanna karala. Takhana ami taderake saktisali karalama trtiya ekajanera madhyame. Tara saba'i balala, amara tomadera prati prerita hayechi.
Tara balala, tomara to amadera mata'i manusa, rahamana allaha kichu'i nayila karenani. Tomara kebala mithya'i bale yaccha.
Rasulagana balala, amadera para'oyaradegara janena, amara abasya'i tomadera prati prerita hayechi.
Pariskarabhabe allahara bani pauche deya'i amadera dayitba.

Tara balala, amara tomaderake asubha-akalyanakara dekhachi. Yadi tomara birata na ha'o, tabe abasya'i tomaderake prastara barsane hatya karaba ebam amadera paksa theke tomaderake yantranadayaka sasti sparsa karabe.
Rasulagana balala, tomadera akalyana tomadera sathe'i! Eta ki ejan'ye ye, amara tomaderake sadupadesa diyechi? Bastutah tomara sima langhanakari sampradaya bai na'o.
Atahpara saharera prantabhaga theke eka byakti daure ela. Se balala, he amara sampradaya tomara rasulaganera anusarana kara.
Anusarana kara tadera, yara tomadera kache kona binimaya kamana kare na, athaca tara supatha prapta.
Amara ki hala ye, yini amake srsti karechena ebam yara kache tomara pratyabartita habe, ami tamra ebadata karaba na

ami ki tamra paribarte an'yan'yaderake upasyarupe grahana karaba? Karunamaya yadi amake kaste nipatita karate cana, tabe tadera suparisa amara kona'i kaje asabe na ebam tara amake raksa'o karate parabe na.
Erupa karale ami prakasya pathabhrastataya patita haba.
Ami niscitabhabe tomadera palanakartara prati bisbasa sthapana karalama. Ata'eba amara kacha theke sune na'o.
Take bala hala, jannate prabesa kara. Se balala haya, amara sampradaya yadi kona krame janate parata
ye amara para'oyaradegara amake ksama karechena ebam amake sam'manitadera antarbhukta karechena.
Tarapara ami tara sampradayera upara akasa theke kona bahini abatirna karini ebam ami (bahini) abataranakari'o na.
Bastutah e chila eka mahanada. Atahpara sange sange saba'i stad'dha haye gela.
Bandadera jan'ye aksepa ye, tadera kache emana kona rasula'i agamana kareni yadera prati tara bidrupa kare na.
Tara ki pratyaksa kare na, tadera purbe ami kata sampradayake dhbansa karechi ye, tara tadera madhye ara phire asabe na.
Odera saba'ike samabeta abasthaya amara darabare upasthita hate'i habe.
Tadera jan'ye ekati nidarsana mrta prthibi. Ami eke sanjibita kari ebam ta theke utpanna kari sasya, tara ta theke bhaksana kare.
Ami tate srsti kari khejura o angurera bagana ebam prabahita kari tate nirjharini.
Yate tara tara phala khaya. Tadera hata eke srsti kare na. Atahpara tara krtajnata prakasa kare na kena
pabitra tini yini yamina theke utpanna udbhidake, tadera'i manusake ebam ya tara jane na, tara pratyekake jora jora kare srsti karechena.
Tadera jan'ye eka nidarsana ratri, ami ta theke dinake apasarita kari, takhana'i tara andhakare theke yaya.
Surya tara nirdista abasthane abartana kare. Eta parakramasali, sarbajna, allahara niyantrana.
Candrera jan'ye ami bibhinna manayila nirdharita karechi. Abasese se puratana kharjura sakhara anurupa haye yaya.
Surya nagala pete pare na candrera ebam ratri agre cale na dinera pratyeke'i apana apana kaksapathe santarana kare.
Tadera jan'ye ekati nidarsana e'i ye, ami tadera santana-santatike bojha'i naukaya arohana kariyechi.
Ebam tadera jan'ye naukara anurupa yanabahana srsti karechi, yate tara arohana kare.
Ami iccha karale taderake nimajjata karate pari, takhana tadera jan'ye kona sahayyakari ne'i ebam tara paritrana'o pabe na.
Kintu amara'i paksa theke krpa ebam taderake kichu kala jibanopabhoga karara suyoga deyara karane ta kari na.
Ara yakhana taderake bala haya, tomara samanera ayaba o pechanera ayabake bhaya kara, yate tomadera prati anugraha kara haya, takhana tara ta agrahya kare.
Yakhana'i tadera palanakartara nirdesabalira madhye theke kona nirdesa tadera kache ase, takhana'i tara ta theke mukhe phiriye neya.

Yakhana taderake bala haya, allaha tomaderake ya diyechena, ta theke byaya kara. Takhana kapherara muminaganake bale, iccha karale'i allaha yake kha'oyate paratena, amara take kena kha'oyaba? Tomara to spasta bibhrantite patita rayecha.
Tara bale, tomara satyabadi hale bala e'i oyada kabe purna habe
tara kebala ekata bhayabaha sabdera apeksa karache, ya taderake aghata karabe tadera parasparika bakabitandakale.
Takhana tara ochiyata karate'o saksama habe na. Ebam tadera paribara-parijanera kache'o phire yete parabe na.
Singaya phumka deya habe, takhana'i tara kabara theke tadera palanakartara dike chute calabe.
Tara balabe, haya amadera durbhoga! Ke amaderake nidrasthala theke ukhita karala? Rahamana allaha to era'i oyada diyechilena ebam rasulagana satya balechilena.
Eta to habe kebala eka mahanada. Se muhurte'i tadera saba'ike amara samane upasthita kara habe.
Ajakera dine kara'o prati juluma kara habe na ebam tomara ya karabe kebala tara'i pratidana pabe.
Edina jannatira anande masagula thakabe.
Tara ebam tadera strira upabista thakabe chayamaya paribese asane helana diye.
Sekhane tadera jan'ye thakabe phala-mula ebam ya ca'ibe.
Karunamaya palanakartara paksa theke taderake bala habe salama.
He aparadhira! Aja tomara alada haye ya'o.
He bani-adama! Ami ki tomaderake bale rakhini ye, sayatanera ebadata karo na, se tomadera prakasya satru
ebam amara ebadata kara. Eta'i sarala patha.
Sayatana tomadera aneka dalake pathabhrasta kareche. Tabu'o ki tomara bujhani
e'i se jahannama, yara oyada tomaderake deya hato.
Tomadera kupharera karane aja ete prabesa kara.
Aja ami tadera mukhe mohara emte deba tadera hata amara sathe katha balabe ebam tadera pa tadera krtakarmera saksya debe.
Ami iccha karale tadera drsti sakti bilupta kare dite paratama, takhana tara pathera dike daurate ca'ile kemana kare dekhate peta
ami iccha karale taderake sba sba sthane akara bikrta karate paratama, phale tara age'o calate parata na ebam pechane'o phire yete parata na.
Ami yake dirgha jibana dana kari, take srstigata purbabasthaya phiriye ne'i. Tabu'o ki tara bujhe na
ami rasulake kabita siksa de'ini ebam ta tara jan'ye sobhaniya'o naya. Eta to eka upadesa o prakasya kora'ana.
Yate tini satarka karena jibitake ebam yate kapheradera birud'dhe abhiyoga pratisthita haya.
Tara ki dekhe na, tadera jan'ye ami amara nija hatera tairi bastura dbara catuspada jantu srsti karechi, atahpara tara'i egulora malika.
Ami eguloke tadera hate asahaya kare diyechi. Phale edera kataka tadera bahana ebam kataka tara bhaksana kare.
Tadera jan'ye catuspada jantura madhye aneka upakarita o paniya rayeche. Tabu'o kena tara sukariya adaya kare na
tara allahara paribarte aneka upasya grahana kareche yate tara sahayyaprapta hate pare.
Athaca esaba upasya taderake sahayya karate saksama habe na ebam egulo tadera bahini rupe dhrta haye asabe.
Ata'eba tadera katha yena apanake duhkhita na kare. Ami jani ya tara gopane kare ebam ya tara prakasye kare.
Manusa ki dekhe na ye, ami take srsti karechi birya theke? Atahpara takhana'i se haye gela prakasya bakabitandakari.
Se amara samparke eka adbhuta katha barnana kare, athaca se nijera srsti bhule yaya. Se bale ke jibita karabe asthisamuhake yakhana segulo pace gale yabe
baluna, yini prathamabara seguloke srsti karechena, tini'i jibita karabena. Tini sarbaprakara srsti samparke samyaka abagata.
Yini tomadera jan'ye sabuja brksa theke aguna utpanna karena. Takhana tomara ta theke aguna jbala'o.
Yini nabhomandala o bhumandala srsti karechena, tini'i ki tadera anurupa srsti karate saksama nana? Hyam tini mahasrasta, sarbajna.
Tini yakhana kona kichu karate iccha karena, takhana take kebala bale dena, ‘ha'o’ takhana'i ta haye yaya.
Ata'eba pabitra tini, yamra hate sabakichura rajatba ebam tamra'i dike tomara pratyabartita habe.
